enum.name: GuideBallSideEnum
enum.comment: Enumeration defining on which side of the robot the ball shall be guided (and thus on which side the arm is to be erected).
enum.item: Constant defining that the kicker shall activate the ball guidance device in such a way that the left arm is erected.
Constant defining that the kicker shall activate the ball guidance device in such a way that the right arm is erected.

data.comment: In these variables it is stored how often the right, center or left kick have been triggered.
data.field: Side where the ball guidance arm is currently erected.

message.name: Kick
message.comment: Triggers a kick with the given parameters.
message.field: True to kick with left kicker.
True to kick with central kicker.
True to kick with right kicker.

message.name: ResetCounter
message.comment: Reset the internal counter for number of kicks

message.name: GuideBall
message.field: Side where to guide the ball and erect the arm.
